mapper.insert: insert into bsc_measure (measure_id, parent_measure_id, measure_name, source_type_id, formula_expr, source_id, is_private, owner_org_id, result_type_id, obj_cate_id, inner_level_order, measure_desc) values (#{measure_id}, #{parent_measure_id}, #{measure_name}, #{source_type_id}, '', '', 'Y', #{owner_id}, '00', #{obj_cate_id}, #{inner_level_order jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{measure_desc})
mapper.delete: delete from bsc_measure where measure_id = #{measure_id} and owner_org_id = #{owner_id}
mapper.select: select a.*,b.obj_cate_desc,c.source_type_desc from bsc_measure a,bsc_obj_cate b,bsc_mea_source_type c where a.measure_id = #{measure_id} and a.owner_org_id = #{owner_id} and a.obj_cate_id = b.obj_cate_id(+) and a.source_type_id = c.source_type_id(+)

select a.*, case when b.measure_id is null then 'Y' else 'N' end is_leaf from bsc_measure a,(select parent_measure_id as measure_id from bsc_measure group by parent_measure_id) b where a.parent_measure_id = #{parent_measure_id} and a.owner_org_id = #{owner_id} and a.is_private = 'Y' and a.measure_id = b.measure_id(+)
and a.obj_cate_id = '${obj_cate_id}'
order by a.inner_level_order, a.measure_id
select a.* from bsc_measure a,bsc_measure_exe b where a.measure_id = b.rely_measure_id and b.measure_id = #{measure_id} order by b.in_level_order
select measure_name from bsc_measure where measure_id = #{measure_id}
select parameter_name from bsc_parameter where parameter_id = #{parameter_id}
select count(*) from bsc_measure where parent_measure_id = #{measure_id}
